content.title: Grammar
content.description:
Negative present perfect tense
have not + past participle
Example: I have not read this book. You have not watched this film.

content.title: Conversation
table: Elnaz: My favourite kind of music is classical music.
الناز: موسیقی مورد علاقه من موسیقی کلاسیک است
Roham: Can you play any (musical) instrument?
Elnaz: Yes, I play the piano.
Roham: I have a collection of records.
روهام: یک مجموعه از صفحه‌های موسیقی دارم
Roham: I love the works of beethoven and I have all his symphonies.
روهام: عاشق کارهای بتهون هستم و تمام سمفونی‌های او را دارم

content.title: Grammar
content.description:
Past Perfect tense
had + past participle
I had gone, You had gone
Example: You had given me the book
She had gone to school
They had started the game

content.title: Common Phrases
table: Could we see each other today?
Do you have free time tonight?
Would you like to go out for a meal?
دوست دارید برای غذا برویم بیرون؟
Would you like to come with me?

content.title: Reading
content.description:
Persepolis is the name of one of the oldest cities in Iran and it is located in the northern Fars province. The founder of the city was Darioush the great. In this city many historical inscriptions have been found.
330 years before Christ, Alexander from Macedonia attacked and burned down Persepolis. Many Iranian books and other art were lost in the fire.
